RelatedSentence: NEW DELHI : A party needs to have at least 55 members in the Lok Sabha to be recognized as one within the House .
NEW DELHI : A party needs to have at least 55 members in the Lok Sabha to be recognized as one within the House .
The Congress faces this ignominy thanks to a1998 law distinguishing a recognized party from a distinguished group for the purpose of providing different levels of facilities to the two categories .
The Congress faces this ignominy thanks to a1998 law distinguishing a recognized party from a distinguished group for the purpose of providing different levels of facilities to the two categories .

Section 2 of the leaders and chief whips of recognized parties and groups in Parliament ( facilities ) Act , 1998 specifies that the cutoff for Lok Sabha is 55 members and Rajya Sabha is 25 , each of which is about 10 % of the total strength of the respective House .
The 1998 law may also put a question mark on whether Congress , with a tally of 44 members in the Lok Sabha , is legally entitled to claim the office of the Leader of the Opposition ( LOP ) .
The 1998 law may also put a question mark on whether Congress , with a tally of 44 members in the Lok Sabha , is legally entitled to claim the office of the Leader of the Opposition ( LOP ) .
Though the designation was formally conferred for the first time in 1969 on the leader of a Congress breakaway , it took another eight years for the office of LOP to attain a statutory status .
Section 2 of the 1977 Act defines the LOP of each House as the leader in that House of the party in opposition to the Government having the greatest numerical strength .
Section 2 of the 1977 Act defines the LOP of each House as the leader in that House of the party in opposition to the Government having the greatest numerical strength .
Besides , the 1977 law enters the caveat that the Opposition party in question will have to be recognized as such by the presiding officer of the House .
Besides , the 1977 law enters the caveat that the Opposition party in question will have to be recognized as such by the presiding officer of the House .

In the pre-1998 scenario , the tally of 44 seats would not have disqualified Congress from bagging the LOP post as , under the 1977 law , the Speaker would have had no choice but to recognize it as the party with the greatest numerical strength in the Opposition .

A1: the LOP post , which enjoys the status of a Cabinet minister

In the pre-1998 scenario , the tally of 44 seats would not have disqualified Congress from bagging the LOP post as , under the 1977 law , the Speaker would have had no choice but to recognize it as the party with the greatest numerical strength in the Opposition .

In the pre-1998 scenario , the tally of 44 seats would not have disqualified Congress from bagging the LOP post as , under the 1977 law , the Speaker would have had no choice but to recognize it as the party with the greatest numerical strength in the Opposition .
But the 1998 law has thrown a spanner in the works for the Congress party .
In the circumstances , it may be anomalous for the Congress leader to be designated as the LOP under the 1977 law overriding the condition imposed by the 1998 law .
This is despite a proviso in the 1998 law that no facilities could be provided under it to any leader who holds the office of the LOP under the 1977 law .
The adversity faced by the Congress party will not however yield an opportunity to parties with lesser strength to wangle the LOP post , which enjoys the status of a Cabinet minister .
The adversity faced by the Congress party will not however yield an opportunity to parties with lesser strength to wangle the LOP post , which enjoys the status of a Cabinet minister .
The adversity faced by the Congress party will not however yield an opportunity to parties with lesser strength to wangle the LOP post , which enjoys the status of a Cabinet minister .
This is because both the 1977 and 1998 laws recognize only parties , not alliances , whether pre or post election .
Hence , there is little likelihood of the Trinamool Congress succeeding in its reported move to claim the LOP post on the basis of a possible tie - up with AIADMK .
It is the trend in the last two decades of laws providing the inclusion of the LOP in the selection committee for the appointment of various statutory authorities : NHRC , CVC , CIC and Lokpal .
